description: This easy bake is warming and full of autumnal flavours, perfect for a sweet breakfast or healthy dessert.
name: Apple, Pear & Oat Bake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium apples, peeled, cored and chopped
2 medium pears, peeled, cored and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 170Â°C. Mix the milk, spices, apples and pears in a small saucepan and cook on medium heat for 8 minutes to soften the fruit.
Pour the mix into a large bowl, stir in the oats, egg, vanilla, almonds and baking powder and mix well.
Tip the mix into an ovenproof baking dish and bake for 3035 minutes. Serve warm with yoghurt dolloped on top.
